quotes.quote: Faith must have adequate evidence, else it is mere superstition.
quotes.author: Alexander Hodge

quotes.quote: I have only one superstition. I touch all the bases when I hit a home run.
quotes.author: Babe Ruth

quotes.quote: Fear is the main source of superstition, and one of the main sources of cruelty. To conquer fear is the beginning of wisdom.
quotes.author: Bertrand Russell

quotes.quote: We do not destroy religion by destroying superstition.
quotes.author: Cicero

quotes.quote: A superstition is a premature explanation that overstays its time.
quotes.author: George Iles

quotes.quote: Security is mostly a superstition. It does not exist in nature.... Life is either a daring adventure or nothing.
quotes.author: Helen Keller

quotes.quote: Count Hermann Keyserling once said truly that the greatest American superstition was belief in facts.
quotes.author: John Gunther
